    • Constructor Detail

      • ListController

        public ListController()
        Creates a controller for a certain list. This controller is given to another thread, and that thread can use this controller to modify the list. Controller holds a few checks and methods to allow multi-threading and importing/ exporting the list to/from a file.

    • Method Detail

      • addItem

        public static <T extends ShopItem> void addItem(T newItem,
                                                MyList<T> list)
        Appends an item into the end of the list.
        Parameters:
        newItem - the item to append into this list.
        list - the list to add the new item to

      • combine

        public static void combine(MyLinkedList<ShopItem> exhaust,
                           MyLinkedList<ShopItem> total)
        Combines two lists of the same type. Checks through the items inside the list and then if there are same items it combines their amounts.
        Parameters:
        exhaust - list that is combined to the other
        total - list to combine with

      • listToTxt

        public static java.lang.String listToTxt(MyLinkedList<ShopItem> list)
        Converts the list into a text file. Text file can be opened then in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        list - the list to convert.
        Returns:
        the converted string

      • txtToList

        public static MyLinkedList<ShopItem> txtToList(java.lang.String str)
        Converts a string into a shopping list. .sli file can be edited then in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to convert.
        Returns:
        the converted list
